item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, January 21, 2025 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:

11. More than 40% of postdocs leave academia, study reveals (42 points | 44 comments)

13. Guitar chord karaoke with Vamp, Chordino, and FFmpeg (2022) (85 points | 20 comments)

22. The most viewed articles of 2024 (6 points | discuss)
23. YC X25, the spring 2025 batch (49 points | 33 comments)

25. Show HN: CFRS[] Community Demos: Patterns with turtle graphics using 6 commands (8 points | 1 comment)
26. Kronotop: Redis-compatible, transactional document store backed by FoundationDB (56 points | 10 comments)
27. Flag drawing with Turtle (22 points | 4 comments)

29. Slugs on a Cube: An Interactive Animation (47 points | 5 comments)
